ns0:simpleDc.ns2:title: Daily Micrometeorological Data at a Sub-Arctic Black Spruce Forest in Interior Alaska
ns0:simpleDc.ns2:subject: micrometeorological
carbon flux

ns0:dcTerms.ns2:abstract: A continuous observation of energy, water, and carbon fluxes and micrometeorological variables in a mature black spruce forest in Interior Alaska. References: http://asiaflux.net/newsletter/no22_2007.pdf (p25-33) http://asiaflux.net/newsletter/AsiaFlux_Newsletter_32.pdf (p13-18)
